item.title: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 称第三季度收入翻番
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 表示，第三季度收入增长了一倍多，公司正在为明年在美国上市做准备。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Kraken says revenue more than doubled in the third quarter, as the company gears up for a public listing in the US next year.】

item.title: 苹果、谷歌的移动系统面临英国更深入的反垄断审查
item.description: 苹果公司和 Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司在英国被指定为所谓的战略市场地位，从而使美国公司的移动生态系统市场受到英国反垄断监督机构更深入的审查。【原文：Apple Inc. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google were designated with so called strategic market status in the UK, exposing the US firm’s mobile ecosystems market to deeper scrutiny from the country’s antitrust watchdog.】

item.title: 大豆稳定在两个月高位附近，中美贸易成为焦点
item.description: 大豆在芝加哥稳定在约两个月来的最高点以下，因为市场仍在关注中美贸易的前景。【原文：Soybeans steadied below the highest in about two months in Chicago, as focus remained on prospects for trade between the US and China.】

item.title: 黄金出口激增增强埃塞俄比亚对强势货币的信心
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚央行行长表示，在黄金出口量首次超过咖啡出口量的支撑下，埃塞俄比亚的货币在未来几个月内有望获得收益。【原文：Ethiopia’s currency looks set to gain in coming months, supported by surging gold exports that have surpassed coffee shipments for the first time, the nation’s central bank governor said.】

item.title: 金属交易商 IXM 在三年后接替 Ives 担任首席执行官
item.description: 肯尼-艾夫斯（Kenny Ives）在担任全球第三大金属贸易公司 IXM 的首席执行官三年后即将卸任，该公司由中国五矿集团（CMOC Group）控股。【原文：Kenny Ives is stepping down as chief executive of IXM, the third-largest global metals trading company that is owned by China’s CMOC Group, after three years in the job.】

item.title: 国家冰球联盟成为首个与卡尔希、Polymarket 达成协议的联盟
item.description: 美国国家冰球联盟与 Kalshi 和 Polymarket 达成了多年期协议，成为第一个同意与预测市场平台合作的美国大型体育联盟。【原文：The National Hockey League has struck multiyear deals with Kalshi and Polymarket, becoming the first major American sports league to agree to work with the prediction market platforms.】

item.title: 瑞典的 Stegra 风险波及国家贷款机构和养老基金
item.description: Stegra AB 是一家绿色钢铁初创企业，除了已经获得的 65 亿欧元（75 亿美元）股权和债务混合融资外，瑞典政府还在努力争取更多资金。【原文：The Swedish state is looking increasingly exposed to Stegra AB, the green steel startup racing to secure extra funding on top of the €6.5 billion ($7.5 billion) it has already secured in a mixture of equity and debt financing.】

item.title: GE Vernova 首席执行官认为面向超大型企业的涡轮机销售将大幅增长
item.description: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司（GE Vernova Inc.【原文：GE Vernova Inc. expects an increasing amount of its gas turbines to be snapped up by big tech firms building data centers.】

item.title: 次级贷款机构 PrimaLend 在债券违约后进入破产程序
item.description: PrimaLend Capital Partners 因拖欠债务利息，在与债权人进行了数月谈判后申请破产。【原文：PrimaLend Capital Partners filed for bankruptcy after months of negotiations with creditors following missed interest payments on its debt.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 HTX 因非法推广资产被英国起诉
item.description: 英国金融监管局起诉了 HTX 旗下的几个实体，HTX 是一家数字资产交易所，与特朗普家族的加密货币知己贾斯汀-孙（Justin Sun）有联系。【原文：The UK’s finance watchdog sued several entities that form part of HTX, a digital asset exchange with links to Trump family cryptocurrency confidant Justin Sun.】

item.title: 美联储提出大银行增资幅度更小的计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美联储已向其他美国监管机构展示了一份修订计划的大纲，该计划将大幅放宽拜登时代针对华尔街最大贷款机构提出的银行资本建议。【原文：The Federal Reserve has shown other US regulators the outlines of a revised plan that would dramatically relax a Biden-era bank capital proposal for Wall Street’s largest lenders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说土耳其将考虑废除通货膨胀会计做法
item.description: 据熟悉讨论情况的人士透露，土耳其正在重新考虑是否终止一项要求公司根据高通胀率调整账目的会计规则。【原文：Turkey is reconsidering whether to end an accounting rule that requires companies to adjust their books for high inflation, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官支持的初创公司寻求扮演人工智能芯片媒人的角色
item.description:
Gimlet 正在构建一款软件，该软件将分解人工智能任务，并将其发送给最具成本效益的芯片

。【原文：

Gimlet is building software that will chop up AI tasks and send them to the most cost-effective chips

】

item.title: Unity 为游戏制作者提供新的付款方式以避开苹果公司
item.description: Unity 软件公司正在推出一款免费的支付产品，使视频游戏制作者可以绕过苹果公司应用商店等分销平台收取的高额费用。【原文：Unity Software Inc. is launching a free payments product that will allow video game-makers to get around the high fees charged by distribution platforms like Apple Inc.’s App store.】

item.title: 被特朗普赦免的人也希望银行原谅他们的过去
item.description: 总统批准是一回事，银行批准又是另一回事。银行批准又是另一回事。【原文：It’s one thing to be cleared by the president. It’s another to be cleared by the bank.】

item.title: Mackenzie、Northleaf 通过多资产私募基金瞄准零售业
item.description: 加拿大基金管理公司麦肯锡投资公司（Mackenzie Investments）和诺斯里夫资本合伙公司（Northleaf Capital Partners）正在扩大其向散户投资者提供私人资产的战略，推出一种旨在模仿传统增长和收益投资组合的新产品。【原文：Canadian fund managers Mackenzie Investments and Northleaf Capital Partners are extending their strategy of offering private assets to retail investors with a new product that aims to mimic a traditional growth and income portfolio.】

item.title: 人工智能搜索 10 亿条交易条款，展示贷款人的违约抗辩
item.description: 根据人工智能模型对信贷文件进行的分析，贷款人正在加强破产保护措施，以应对高调内讧后的进一步困境。【原文：Lenders are ramping up bankruptcy protection measures as they position for further distress in the wake of high-profile implosions, according to an analysis of credit documents conducted by an artificial intelligence model.】

item.title: 欧洲恶劣天气预报导致电价下跌
item.description: 欧洲正准备迎接狂风和不寻常的秋季高温这两场动荡的鸡尾酒会，从而推动主要地区市场的电力价格下降。【原文：Europe is bracing for a volatile cocktail of windstorms and unusual autumnal heat, driving down power prices in key regional markets.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行债券面临 ESG 基金因苏丹裁决而抛售的风险
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）分析师称，法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）债券可能面临来自环境、社会和治理策略基金的抛售压力，因为法院裁定该法国银行与苏丹的侵犯人权行为有关。【原文：BNP Paribas SA bonds could see selling pressure from funds with environmental, social and governance strategies following a court ruling that linked the French bank to human rights abuses in Sudan, according to Barclays Plc analysts.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称当前利率水平合适
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，他对目前的借贷成本设置感到满意。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said he is satisfied with present settings for borrowing costs.】

item.title: 加密货币主经纪商 FalconX 将收购 ETP 发行商 21shares
item.description: 加密货币主经纪商 FalconX 同意收购数字资产交易所交易产品的最大发行商之一 21shares，因为美国更友好的监管环境推动了交易的回升。【原文：Crypto prime broker FalconX agreed to acquire 21shares, one of the largest issuers of digital-asset exchange-traded products, as a friendlier regulatory climate in the US drives a pickup in deals.】

item.title: 特朗普誓言释放美国能源 推动输油管道建设
item.description:
在总统支持化石燃料的激励下，金德摩根公司、奥诺克公司和其他公司正在筹备雄心勃勃的项目。【原文：

Invigorated by the president’s support for fossil fuels, Kinder Morgan, Oneok and others are prepping ambitious projects.

】

item.title: 如果收益率持续走低，里夫斯可在预算中节省 45 亿英镑
item.description: 过去一周英国政府借贷成本的大幅下降有可能为财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯节省数十亿英镑，因为她的财政监督机构尚未决定何时在 11 月预算公布前关闭债务利息预测。【原文：The sharp fall in UK government borrowing costs over the past week has potentially saved Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves billions of pounds as her fiscal watchdog has yet to decide when to close its debt-interest forecast ahead of the budget in November.】

item.title: 英国能源业呼吁监管机构在失败后解体
item.description: 英国能源行业呼吁解散监管机构 Ofgem，理由是该机构机构臃肿、干预措施繁琐，而且无力阻止近年来发生的一系列能源供应商倒闭事件，这些事件给消费者的账单增加了约 45 亿英镑的额外成本。【原文：The UK energy industry has called for the regulator Ofgem to be broken up citing a bloated organization, onerous interventions and its inability to prevent a series of energy supplier failures that added some £4.5 billion of extra costs to consumers’ bills in recent years.】

item.title: 私募股权投资支持的首次公开募股在中东渐受青睐
item.description: 近年来，中东已成为首次公开发行股票最繁忙的地区之一，迄今为止，这一市场主要由国家支持的家族企业主导。银行家们现在看到了一个新的机遇：私募股权支持的上市。【原文：The Middle East has become one of the busiest regions for initial public offerings in recent years, a market so far dominated by state-backed and family-run businesses. Bankers now see a new opportunity emerging: private equity-backed listings.】

item.title: 卡塔尔能源公司计划下周在巴基斯坦举行会谈，讨论液化天然气延迟问题
item.description: 卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）的官员将于下周与巴基斯坦的官员会面，以最终确定这个亚洲国家政府提出的在需求低迷的情况下减少明年天然气运输量的要求。【原文：QatarEnergy officials will meet counterparts in Pakistan next week to finalize requests by the Asian nation’s government to reduce gas shipments next year as demand languishes.】

item.title: 中国手机制造商追逐的是小米，而不是苹果
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）将评述小米积极与 iPhone 正面交锋的反响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov reviews the reverberations of Xiaomi’s aggressive move to go head-to-head with the iPhone.】

item.title: Lyft 测试忠诚度计划，为未来乘车提供现金返还
item.description: Lyft 公司正在试行一项计划，为部分客户提供未来乘车的现金返还，这是该公司从竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. is piloting a program that offers some customers cash back on future rides, the latest effort to win over users from rival Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 中国对美出口受挫而非被特朗普关税击垮
item.description: 事实证明，中国是美国难以取代的世界制造业强国。【原文：China is proving a difficult rival for the US to dethrone as the world’s manufacturing powerhouse.】
